data.title: Melinda French Gates on divorce with Microsoft co
data.meta_description: TECH NEWS : Melinda French Gates opened up about her divorce from Microsoft co-founder Bill Gates in 2021, describing the end of their 27-year marriage as a painf
data.text: The TOI Tech Desk is a dedicated team of journalists committed to delivering the latest and most relevant news from the world of technology to readers of The Times of India.
